rules_text:
Scry 4
Target artifact deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to target creature.
Tap up to ten target permanents. Each tapped permanent your opponents control deals 1 damage to its controller.
special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 2, then draw a card.
[-2]: Target artifact deals damage equal to its mana value to target creature.
[-7]: Exile up to three target instant, sorcery, artifact, or enchantment cards from your graveyard. Copy them. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.
